comments:
I wanted to see the editors for a bunch of files, so first I tried selecting 
several files and using the context menu but 'show editors' was disabled (it 
really needs to support multiple selection). Then I tried selecting some 
directories but that didn't work either. So I tried selecting the project 
itself (top level) and doing 'show editors'. That produced a dialog saying an 
error had occurred, and the editors view shows one entry, a file name 
called '? .project'. Show editors is hosed at this point and won't do anything 
else until I close the view. I got some messages in the .log file which I'll 
paste below. I'm using I20030129.
